text: Are you ready to start the experiment
What Role gives 'Zacchariah' permission to 'Update' Files in a Folder called 'lib_serv'
What Rule/Rules grant full permissions (L,G,C,U,D) to 'Wilfreds' File called 'diary.doc'
What permissions does 'Nancy' have to the Folder '/apps/LIB_SYS' and which of her Roles has the permissions been granted to
Do all the Users who have been granted 'Update' access on the Folder called 'lib_serv' have exactly the same permissions as each other

Ralph and Siobhan are visiting the University and have been given the Role of 'Guest'. They both need List and Get access to 'apps/LIB_SYS'. a) Which one of them has been given the right access, and b) What other Role has granted this access
Kim wants to 'Update' the welcome.mp4 video which is in a Folder under '/db'. What User should she contact who has the required access to the File, and what Role gives them that access
Which Folder would you find 'Quincys' own Folder under, and does he have ALL permissions (L,G,C,U,D) or only SOME granted to all Folders and Files under his own Folder.
Can all Users with 'Employee' Role 'Delete' files from their own named Folder
Which Users have their own named Folder under '/usr/emp/aca', and what Roles do they both have
Three Users with 'MSC_Student' Role also have 'Employee' Role. What Rule or Rules grant/deny access to '/apps/BOX'

'Gabrielle' should have full access to '/db/db_hr', but NO access to '/db/db_hr/db_pay'. a) What Rule or Rules grant/deny access, b) Has the Rule or Rules been set correctly c) What other User does the Rule effect
Lawrence is NOT able to 'Update' the 'eng_courses.doc' File on '/apps/CANVAS'. What Role/s should he be added to that would set this permission for him

The 'IT_Admin' Role should have ALL permissions to '/apps/IT_TICKET'. The 'Student' Role should be able to 'Create' and 'Update' on the '/apps/IT_TICKET'. a) Do BOTH Roles have the correct permissions and b) Which Rules set the permissions
How many 'Users' have ALL permissions to the File eng_modules.xlsx, and what Rule has given this access
How many 'Roles' have ANY level of permission granted to access the '/db/db_hr' Folder
How many 'Users' and which 'Roles' would be affected if Rule No. 8 granted additional 'Create' permissions
What is the difference between 'Barry' and 'Adele' access to '/db/db_emp'
